macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: TYPE
macro.description: The type of the module (thermocouple or strain gauge).

macro.name: INP_0_CONNECTED
macro.description: Is input channel 0 connected (only relevant for THERMO type module).

macro.name: INP_1_CONNECTED
macro.description: Is input channel 1 connected (only relevant for THERMO type module).

macro.name: INP_2_CONNECTED
macro.description: Is input channel 2 connected (only relevant for THERMO type module).

macro.name: INP_3_CONNECTED
macro.description: Is input channel 3 connected (only relevant for THERMO type module).

macro.name: INP_4_CONNECTED
macro.description: Is input channel 4 connected (only relevant for THERMO type module).

macro.name: INP_5_CONNECTED
macro.description: Is input channel 5 connected (only relevant for THERMO type module).

macro.name: INP_6_CONNECTED
macro.description: Is input channel 6 connected (only relevant for THERMO type module).

macro.name: INP_7_CONNECTED
macro.description: Is input channel 7 connected (only relevant for THERMO type module).
